timeline.message:
Don't use the deprecated method (#8938)

Stop using the method that was deprecated in 1.11.1

Closes #8929
fix: fetch real type for generic typed parameter (#8939)
Fixes from backporting frontend live-reload into master (#8937)
Make the CustomInMemoryDataProvider implement listeners handling (#8961)

Read attribute value from template (#8957)

Read static attributes values for @Id mapped elements

Fixes #3735

Always consume the stdout stream from (p)npm and log at debug level (#7325) (#8980)

(cherry picked from commit 816a09474f2a3d105de00e4eb81960f7932dc0c3)

# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunNpmInstall.java

Co-authored-by: Johannes Eriksson <joheriks@vaadin.com>

Upgrade auto-installed Node to latest LTS and suppress some `npm install` errors (#8956)

Upgrade installed node to latest LTS and set `scripts-prepend-node-artifact` to ensure same node is used to run npm and package install scripts

Related to #8741

Fix typo in variable DEAULT_FLOW_RESOURCES_FOLDER (#8897)

Replace DEAULT_FLOW_RESOURCES_FOLDER with DEFAULT_FLOW_RESOURCES_FOLDER, but keep the old variable as deprecated.
Support for disabling Win-specific tests in CI (#8986)

Do not force installation of compatible pnpm version when system property `vaadin.ignoreVersionChecks` is set (#8971)

Skip all version checks when ignoreVersionChecks flag is set

Use found pnpm even if version outside of range when `ignoreVersionChecks=true`.

Cache original index.html Document in production mode (#8998)

* Cache original index.html Document in production mode

* Make IndexHtmlHolder serializable

Show webpack error on live reload of frontend resources (#8990)

Identify recompile using webpack console output instead of using a separate comm channel.
This ensures that webpack errors in `DevModeHandler` are synced when the live reload occurs.

fix: surround 404 check with spaces (#8997)

`checkLogsForErrors` checks if the message contains `404`, 
but it will match if the sequence is part of a number.

Implement lit template parser for limited template formats which extends LitTemplate element (#8979)

Implement lit template parser for limited template formats which extends LitTemplate element 

Fixes #8966
Use JS rather than CSS file for testing Webpack live reload, (#9003)

Fixed: flow-server now closes resources properly when parsing java classes (#9002)

As the ClassReader(InputStream) constructor doesn't close the input stream itself, the stream is then left hanging. This is a problem with the Gradle Plugin since the input stream is left hanging in the Gradle Daemon, which can stay around for hours. 

This could be a possible cause for vaadin/vaadin-gradle-plugin#81

Read template attributes as properties (#8988)

Read template attributes as properties

Fixes #8974

Set enable state based on template element attribute (#9007)

Set element disabled if template has disabled property
Fixes #8973
